trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance, or the workflow runtime engine may terminate the instance because of an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Uma instância de fluxo de trabalho pode ser encerrada em uma das três maneiras: o host pode chamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>atividade pode ser chamada de dentro da instância de fluxo de trabalho, ou o mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho pode encerrar a instância devido a uma exceção sem tratamento.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando a instância de fluxo de trabalho for encerrada, o mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho gera o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The host may subscribe to this event by adding an event handler to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O host pode assinar esse evento adicionando um manipulador de eventos para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exceção que causou a instância de fluxo de trabalho a ser encerrada.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, Exception contains the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Quando a instância de fluxo de trabalho é encerrada devido a uma exceção sem tratamento, a exceção contém a exceção sem tratamento.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, Exception contains a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Quando a instância de fluxo de trabalho é encerrada por uma chamada de host para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou por um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>exceção de atividade, contém um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>que tem seu <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>propriedade definida como uma descrição do motivo do encerramento.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se o host encerra a instância de fluxo de trabalho, ele fornece essa descrição no `string` parâmetro para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance is terminated by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, the description is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se a instância de fluxo de trabalho é encerrada com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>a descrição é fornecida pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although in the case of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName> event that is not due to an unhandled exception, the workflow runtime engine encapsulates a description of the reason for the termination in the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>, it does not necessarily throw this exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Embora no caso de um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>eventos que não seja devido a uma exceção sem tratamento, o mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho encapsula uma descrição do motivo para a terminação no <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>, não geram necessariamente essa exceção.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>que causou a instância de fluxo de trabalho a ser encerrada.</xref:System.Exception>
